11523121.content:
Kate gets a mischievous grin on her face and you can't help but feel unnerved by the way she is looking down at you.

"Well now that my big brother has become my LITTLE brother..." (you really didn't like the way she emphasized little) "I know just the perfect game to play with you".

You knew you had to say something before things got too out of hand. Your sister was still young and immature and could easily hurt you by accident if she was not careful. You may have been shrunk (and still trying to figure out how that happened to you), but you were Kate's older brother, and you had to try and take control of the situation. You thought that if you spoke to her with enough authority in your voice, you could get her to listen to you, and take you to someone that may be able to help, like your mother, whom you hoped hadn't left for work already. Boy were you wrong.

"Listen Kate, I'm still your older brother, and you have to do as I tell you".

"Awww" she squealed, "your voice is just so cute, especially when you are still trying to act like my BIG brother". There she goes, emphasizing a word about your height, that makes you feel uncomfortable to the pit of your stomach. "Maybe I will listen to you, but only after we play my game. If you win, then I promise to do what you say, if I win, then you have to accept your punishment."

"No Kate, you have to listen to me. You need to go find mom or Trish, or another adult and te... GAHH!"

Kates whole hand quickly grasped around you and you could feel the pressure rising. You felt like your bones could snap at any second. She raised you up and you could see that the cuteness and innocence of her face had gone, only to be replaced by one of what you could only describe as fury.

"No little brother, you have to listen to me. I am the one giving the orders here, and if you do not want to listen to me, then I can just punish you now, and squash you like the little bug that you are, or you can do what your BIG sis tells you, and we can play a fun little game. This will make up for all the times you refused to play with me when I was a kid."

You decided that now was not the time to point out she was still a child. This was what you were worried about. Kate is too young and immature to realize the gravity of the situation. You saw no other choice but to agree with her terms, and hoped she did take you to mom, if you won her game that is. She was still squeezing you hard, making it difficult for you to breath, and thus talk, so you just looker her in the face and nodded. Almost instantly, the anger she just showed washed away, and was replaced by a large smile and a brightened mood. She opened her palm and let you stand upon it.

"I'm glad you are starting to understand your position Jack, now we can finally have some fun"

The previous experience had left you unnerved, and you felt as though your legs were about to buckle, but you didn’t want to show weakness in front of your sister and so gathered your composure and to find out what she had planned.

“So what game did you have in mind Kate? And what do you mean when you say you will punish me if you win?” this was the part that had Jack most worried.

“The only game that would make sense when I have such a small, cute brother” she replied, the glee in her voice obvious. She really seemed pleased with the idea that she had. “We are going to play cat and mouse!” her smile grew even wider as she said this. “and can you guess which one you are LITTLE brother?”

“The mouse…” you groaned, knowing this game was not going to end well for you. “but you still haven’t told me about this punishment Kate.”

“Ooo you are such a smart little brother, you make your big sister so proud. And don’t worry about that punishment. You will find out what it is when I win.”

It really annoyed you, the way she said ‘…when I win’ and you were determined to prove her wrong, but deep down you knew your chances were very slim. The only possibility you had was to use your size to your advantage and hide somewhere she wouldn’t be able to see you. Perhaps if you were lucky, when she was waiting for you to hide, you could sneak under her door and try to find your mom. However, you were not expecting Kate to do, what she did next.

"KATE! Why are you taking off your top?" she yelled.

"What cats do you know, that wear clothes, I guess you aren't as smart as I thought" she said matter of factly. "Don't worry Jack, we can keep our underwear on if you are to shy to be naked in front of a girl.

You began to blush from embarrassment at being spoke to like this from your younger sister, before you realized and asked "what do you me by 'we' Kate?"

"Don't be so stupid Jack." she answered, the smile dimming on her face, and a tone of frustration in her voice. "Mice obviously don't wear any clothes either. Now what are you waiting for? take off your clothes".

Now you felt like the embarrassment might just kill you. You were being forced to strip down to your boxers, by your sister, while stood in the palm of her hand, You knew you had no choice however, thoughts of the last time you disagreed fresh in your mind. as you began to take off your top, the smile on Kates face returned, but it looked a little different. Pushing those thoughts to the back of your mind, you soon had removed all clothes but your boxers, and Kate gently lowered you down to the ground. for the first time at this size, you could see her at full view. staining your neck up so you could see her face, she looked like a skyscraper. her long wavy brunette hair reached her shoulders and her piercing emerald green eyes were looking down at you. you also saw she was wearing a plain white bra, but you were not sure what they were meant to be covering with her basically flat chest. then your eyes wandered down to her panties, they looked cute from this side, white with little hearts on them, but you shuddered as you remembered your first experience with them at this size. as you stared up at your younger sisters almost naked body, you began to feel something in the pit of your stomach, and while you were not sure what it was, it scared you more than the thoughts of your sisters mysterious punishment for you if she caught you.

115231211111.content:
Kate walked down for breakfast still trying to push the thoughts to the back of her head. As she entered the dining room, she saw her mom and two sisters waiting for her.

“Oh, you are on your own Kate, I thought I heard you talking in your room and assumed your brother was with you? Could you go get him for me? I was hoping we could all have breakfast together before I go to work.”

Kate froze, she had expected a question to come up about her brother, but not so soon. She was beginning to panic. “Oh, he said he… err… had to go to… a friends house… to finish… err… some work for school” she answered, her voice shaky and stuttering.

“I wish he would tell me when he decides to leave” never mind, I will talk to him when I get back.” Karen said, seemingly not noticing her panicked 8-year-old. Amanda kept shovelling cereal down her throat, not paying attention to the conversation, but Trish was looking at Kate with a puzzled look on her face. Kate was young and a terrible liar, but what was it she was hiding?
Karren suddenly got up. “Well it is time I went to work, you girls be good,”. She walked over to Kate and gave her a big hug. “When you see your brother, let him know that I want us all to sit around for a family meal tonight okay? Goodbye girls”, and with that, Karen left for the day. At her mothers last words, Kate began to tear up, but she pushed the feeling back. It was to late now, and she couldn’t act upset in front of her sisters, or they will know something is up.

Trish could see that Kate was upset and hiding something but decided it would be best to ask later when she felt more comfortable. “Do you want some Cereal then Kate?” Trish asked.

Kate quietly nodded and asked for some Lucky Charms. Trish poured her a bowl out and Kate began to eat her second breakfast of the day. After a few minutes of eating, she began to feel a strange feeling in the pit of her stomach, but this feeling didn’t have the same good tingly feeling like she had in her bedroom. This one felt different. She wasn’t sure what it was, until it clicked, she lost all the color in her face as she realised what the thumping feeling was.

In Kates stomach, a few minutes earlier. Jack was lay on his cookie bed, half asleep. Suddenly a mushy wet thing landed on top of him. He sat up and looked to the ceiling of his flesh prison to see what it was. As he did so, another lumpy thing landed on him, followed by some liquid. It was too dark to see what the things were properly, but from the smell he could tell his sister was eating lucky charms and drinking milk. Realising what it was, his fatigue left, and his anger grew, adrenaline pumping through him. His sister had just eaten him because she was hungry. Then shortly after, she starts to eat cereal, as if his life meant nothing. He ran to the wall of her stomach and punched it as hard as he could in frustration. He kept running through his head, how no one will ever know what happened to him, and how the one person that did, didn’t care about it. He was just a small man, trapped in a prison that would soon start to digest him. More lucky charms and milk fell from his jails roof, now starting to cover his feet.

The smell in his prison was terrible. All the sweets in her stomach started to mix together. “Dammit!” he shouted “does this girl not eat anything other than sweets, where are the carbs, the protein…” at his last word, he trailed off as he realised the weight of what he said. He knew that obviously, she did eat some protein for breakfast. The thought of this made him sick to his stomach.
“That’s it” he yelled. If I can make her ill, I have a chance of making it out of this hell hole alive.” He didn’t like the idea of how he was going to get out of here but found it much more agreeable than the alternative exit. He ran back to the wall of her stomach and began to bang on it as hard as possible. Soon he felt a pressure building up above him. Soo he was being pulled up and back into her tight oesophagus and back into the cavernous mouth, that earlier that day had filled him with so much dread but now filled him with hope. Then there was light ahead of him.
